home.title: Lista - Discover the Best Restaurants Near You
home.description: Explore a wide variety of restaurant menus and find your favorite meals with Lista. Browse, discover, and enjoy a seamless food experience.
home.keywords: restaurants, food, menus, discover, Lista, nearby, dining

joinUs.title: Join Us - Partner with Lista
joinUs.description: Become a part of Lista by joining as a brand partner. Submit your application and grow your business with us.
joinUs.keywords: join us, partner with Lista, brand application, business growth, Lista partnership

contactUs.title: Contact Us - Get in Touch with Lista
contactUs.description: Have a question or need assistance? Contact Lista's support team for inquiries, feedback, or collaboration opportunities.
contactUs.keywords: contact us, support, Lista customer service, inquiries, feedback, help

aboutUs.title: About Us - Learn More About Lista
aboutUs.description: Discover the story behind Lista, our mission, vision, and how we help users find the best restaurants and brands near them.
aboutUs.keywords: about Lista, our story, mission, vision, restaurant discovery, brand connections

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions - Lista's Policy
termsAndConditions.description: Read Lista's terms and conditions to understand our policies, guidelines, and user agreements for a smooth experience.
termsAndConditions.keywords: terms and conditions, user policy, guidelines, Lista agreement, service terms

offers.title: Latest Offers - Best Deals and Discounts on Lista
offers.description: Explore the best offers and discounts from top brands and restaurants on Lista. Find deals that suit your taste and budget.
offers.keywords: offers, discounts, best deals, restaurant promotions, brand sales, Lista deals

brands.title: Browse Brands - Find the Best Restaurants and Stores
brands.description: Search and filter through a variety of brands and restaurants on Lista. Use sorting and filters to find the perfect match for your needs.
brands.keywords: brands, restaurants, stores, search brands, filter brands, find restaurants, Lista brands

blog.title: Blogs - Latest Insights & Tips from Lista
blog.description: Stay updated with the latest news, insights, and tips about restaurants, brands, and lifestyle on Lista's blog.
blog.keywords: blogs, articles, restaurant tips, brand insights, food trends, Lista blog, latest updates
